about_the_game:
Embark on an odyssey beyond the stars in "Further," a spellbinding virtual reality adventure that defies the limits of space and imagination. Assume the role of Alex, a fearless protagonist thrust into an interstellar realm of trials, puzzles, and encounters with extraterrestrial entities.

Begin your cosmic escapade on the surface of an asteroid, overlooking the vast cosmic expanse. Armed with a powerful jetpack, your mission initially seems straightforward: repair communication antennas. Yet, as you delve into the heart of the failing station, you'll discover that your journey is merely the prologue to a captivating saga filled with unforeseen twists and challenges.
